entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] SkiaSharp crashes in WebAssembly if building with non-Release/Debug build config #101629
  • Outerloop test builds broken #101628
  • HTTP stress build is broken #101625
  • browser-Release-wasm-Mono_Release-WasmTestOnChrome fails with WebSocketException #101618
  • [wasm][firefox] crit: OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverException: Failed to decode response from marionette #101617
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Assembly.SetEntryAssembly() #101616
    9.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator Method/Interface Info/Context types should limit construction and modification #101615
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: BinaryReader.ReadExactly #101614
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting.FixedWindowRateLimiter sometimes doubles the configured rate #101612
  • [QUIC] Eliminate peer X509 certificate parsing on Linux #101602
  • System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener: System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Count cannot be less than zero. Parameter name: count #101600
  • ARM64 SVE: Zip/Unzip should use predicate variant when all inputs are masks #101598
  • [API Proposal]: DateOnly support in IsoWeek #101597
    Future
  • Improve register allocation for calls with safepoint instruction #101596
    Future
  • Array.IndexOf at string[] slower that naive implementation #101595
    Future
  • Delete UseWindowsThreadpool special casing #101591
    9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Migrate OSX build into MsQuic #101590
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Process.TryGetProcessById() #101582
  • System.IO.FileLoadException: Undefined resource string ID:0x80131621 #101581

Closed

  • [CI] Test failure from `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Cookies_Http3.GetAsync_DefaultCoookieContainer_NoCookieSent` #101567
  • [Mono] Add missing SIMD support for some methods from System.Numerics.Vector2/3/4 and Quaternion on Arm64 #91394
    9.0.0
  • [wasi][mono] Support targeting wasi in AOT compiler #82691
    9.0.0
  • RunAOTCompilation will cause calling to wasm export function throws a "uninitialized element" error #101170
    9.0.0
  • Wrong disposal of FileConfigurationSource.FileProvider by FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose() on a modification of ConfigurationManager.Sources #95745
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: What's the future of dynamic code execution, AOT, JIT and interpreter in .NET-based mobile apps? #101466
  • [wasm] `NativeLibrary` doesn't include file #96864
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] Cannot find host wasmtime #100394
    9.0.0
  • FilesystemWatcher ObjectDisposedException at the ConfigurationBuilder.Build() on the WinForms project .net8 #96212
    9.0.0
  • Support adding links to Activity after it is created #97680
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient.GetStringAsync #101601
  • [android] System.Buffers.ArrayBufferWriter running out-of-memory #101368
    9.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel.Tests are timing out on s390x #101380
    Future
  • Is .net 9 going to support native AOT on WinForms? #101603
  • Add a configuration option to disable the ability for ETW to rundown symbolic state #13571
  • Blazor WASM project will not debug if index.html file includes some scripts with crossorigin #84086
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Add template options #64233
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][windows] v8 doesn't seem to exit sometimes causing helix test run to time out #64227
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] native functions with varargs are not supported #59685
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] ArchiveTests target should remove publish dir on windows #54644
    9.0.0
  • [Mono][Wasm] Pin V8 version for performance runs #45915
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    needs-area-label
  • Update build to `net9.0` images #101630
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Testing] Backport #92296 and #92901 to release/8.0-staging #101627
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable building with gcc-14 #101623
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Intrinsify SpanHelper API's #101622
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Shoring up XmlSerializer/Schema tests #101621
    area-Serialization
  • Refactor AdvSimd version of DecodeFromUTF8 #101620
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Allow moving handler regions in fgRelocateEHRegions #101613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose should dispose FileProvider when it owns it" #101610
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Fix handling of case-sensitive set loops in RegexPrefixAnalyzer.FindPrefixes #101608
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Try to reduce cost of Async #101605
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Start running S.L.Expressions trimming tests #101593
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Start running System.Runtime trimming tests #101592
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump actions/github-script from 6 to 7 #101588
    community-contribution, area-codeflow
  • Bump actions/upload-artifact from 1 to 4 #101587
    community-contribution, area-codeflow
  • Bump dotnet/actions-create-pull-request from 3 to 4 #101586
    community-contribution, area-codeflow
  • Bump actions/checkout from 2.0.0 to 4.1.4 #101585
    community-contribution, area-codeflow

Merged

  • Create separate attribute for warning behavior differences #101220
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Handle case where falseValue is contained #101515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Remove HANDLER_ENTRY_MUST_BE_IN_HOT_SECTION #101611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update link to dotnet-format tool #101619
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Improve tests/profiler/multiple/multiple.cs #101607
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Revert "FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose should dispose FileProvider when it owns it" #101609
    regression-from-last-release, area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • [mono][wasm] Include NativeLibrary items to the NativeFileReference items #101532
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Count*BitElements #101188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [wasi] Separate payload directories per WorkItemPrefix #101599
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Add optimization flags to bitcode compilation #101538
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement Activity.AddLink #101381
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity
  • Fix regression in RegexGenerator.GetSHA256FieldName #101606
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add support for Sve.UnzipEven/Odd & Sve.ZipHighLow #101294
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Reenable disabled test on s390x in ParallelForEachAsyncTests.cs #101527
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Allow preinitializing `EventSource` #101573
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Enable printing disassembly instructions under release mode for JitDisasm. #101281
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Check more invariants on ABI info and fix some arm32 bugs #101372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Add some R2R missing codes. #101480
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Fix dependabot yml #101584
    area-Meta
  • [cdac] Read/store globals from contract descriptor #101450
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix compact time computation #100599
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Collect all `MethodDesc` fields in one place #101565
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • enable dependabot for github actions #101406
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Only warn on duplicate members within a single descriptors file #101574
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix regression from RuntimeType.AllocateValueType rewrite #101137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Annotate `config.GetValue()` with `[NotNullIfNotNull]` #101336
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Implement greedy RPO-based block layout #101473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • With system brotli, do not use versioned symbols #101576
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101316
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • BinaryWriter perf improvements #99775
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Allow JIT to know if dynamic pgo is active #101575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement divide/multiply/subtract Math APIs #101578
    arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono] UnsafeAccessor: Add support for non-generic method instance #101442
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use bison for ilasm parser generator #101415
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Backport #89953, #91658 and #91643 to release/8.0-staging #101579
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure
  • Enable derived COM interfaces to hide base methods with the new keyword #101577
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono] Interpret static constructors without a runtime invoke wrapper #101324
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • Handle > 64 registers + predicate registers for Arm64 #98258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Initial prototype for strength reduction #101431
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Use common CodeGen::genHomeRegisterParams #101288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [mono] Force Mono to respect explicit struct size when LayoutKind.Sequential is used #101529
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Separate hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #101543
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Read EnableWriteXorExecute from runtimeConfig #101490
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add SwiftError support for Swift reverse pinvokes #101122
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static virtual calls #101491
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.x
  • Add some TODO #5213 comments #100954
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Properly disable S.L.Queryable trimming tests with AOT #101417
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Disable interp pgo recording by default since it adds startup overhead #101566
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Simplify some non-generic CompareTo methods #101545
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm]Enable test case in aot mode #101476
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][gc] Remove reliance on regs/stack scanning in some cases #101478
    area-GC-mono
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Instead of disabling all workloads, disable mono toolchain #2565

Merged

  • Add new official build for runtimelab #2563

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable task interop #2551
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publishing a native AOT library shouldn't publish managed symbols and XML doc files of ProjectReferences #40488
  • aspnetcorev2_inprocess should not be published for PublishAot libraries #40487
  • Environment directives passed to `dotnet` should only be applied to the target process #40484
  • dotnet cli should support json output for almost all of the commands. #40470

Closed

  • Ensure NuGet.Localization is updated as part of the NuGet code flow #39559
  • MsBuild task fails with error NETSDK1004 #40483
    Discussion
  • Unable to run sdk solution in Visual Studio. Wrong compiler version referenced. #40423
  • Improve compilation symbols when multi-targeting #1813
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up PR artifacts publishing #40486
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Accept it if the versions from different sets are equal #40485
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • Update prep-source-build.sh #40480
    VMR
  • Allow pushing to VMR's `main-sdk` branch #40479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet/dotnet checkout branch to main-sdk for VMR validation #40467
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update source-mappings.json to remove installer #40464
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set main-sdk as the temporary VMR branch to push to #40463
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Main] Make pipeline ymls work with the SDK repo #40451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2438523 #40397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix reporter encoding #40391
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add more workload set tests #40388
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • More workload set fixes #40266
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40431
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Always available extension methods #4029
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608
  • [Proposal]: Field and value as contextual keywords #7964
  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update params-collections.md based on recent LDM decision #8077
  • Take "non-enumerable collection types" out of C# 12 #8055
  • Dictionary expressions: add resolutions for open questions from LDM-2024-03-11 #8074

Updated

  • Update ref-in-async speclet #8056
  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Temporaries generated by LocalRewriter for collection expression spans should be marked as long-lived #73246
  • `IDE0010: Populate Switch` gives up with simple `or` pattern match #73245
  • An assert is fired when `params` parameter of inferred anonymous delegate has type parameter as its type #73242

Closed

  • CheckForOverflowUnderflow causes casts from nint to void* to fail with an OverflowException when the nint is negative #72967
  • Unexpected behavior when Source Generator access external dll #73235

PullRequests

Created

  • Diagnostics for mismatch between partial property parts #73250
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • WIP: Not for review. #73249
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix issues with pull diagnostics in VSCode #73248
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix need for redundant enter when rename suggestions are not available #73247
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Populate the CurrentBlockAnalysisData's _reachingWrites when creating an OperationTreeAnalysis. #73244
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix IOperation of byref member initializer #73243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow use of more Hot Reload brokered services by LSP (for VS Code) #73240
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix LSP File watching so it correctly reports the baseUri if there's a trailing slash #73203
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Non-array params collections are not applicable in expanded form in C# 12 and below. #73223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Simplify unit testing api. #73241
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with temp storage system on unix systems #73238
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix stack overflow when parsing files linked into an enormous number of projects. #73237
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable Arcade V3 publishing in PR Validation #73221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Handle labels in outer scope in control flow pass #73234
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Promote "Convert to interpolated string" to an analyzer/fixer (#68469) #73008
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Partial Properties
  • Onboard VB intellisense page to Unified Settings #72471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable hosts to provide custom assembly resolution #73185
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Update Semantic Search to work when ServiceHub is disabled #73196
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Implement analyzer/fixer: remove unnecessary `Call` keyword from `Call` statement #73233
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Resolve extension members in all non-invocation contexts #73239
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make a way to configure more options in TokenValidationParameters using simplified authentication configuration #55389
  • System.InvalidOperationException: This request does not have a Content-Type header. Forms are available from requests with bodies like POSTs and a form Content-Type of either application/x-www-form-urlencoded or multipart/form-data #55387
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #55386
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapipublishaot #55385
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55384
  • Style sheet not working after upgrade of ASP.NET Core MVC 7.0 application to 8.0 #55383
  • Browser encryption issue Platform not supported on the latest version of dotnet #55382
  • Unprefixed Hosting Environment Variable is ignored #55379
  • The current environment is Blazor Wasm, and the API tool used is Refit, and the current requirement is to bring the AD information in the Windows domain when logging in to request the API in exchange for a token #55378
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55377
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #55376
  • Render Output Invalid: Improve exception message #55374

Closed

  • Blazor app template fails when name with hyphens used #55388
  • Multiple form inputs with the same name render incorrect output. #52150
  • Clarifying timeouts in SignalR .NET6 #55359
  • ASP0018 complains about catch-all parameter without proposing any solutions #52628
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http 2.2.2 #55352
  • How set Cookie and Session Timeout Based on Logged In User #54966
    Backlog
  • Method for specifying content-encoding in Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi #50056
  • Allow/support route grouping for third-party controllers #47724
  • http.server.active_requests metric incorrect when behind TLS-terminating load balancer #55280
  • How to generate OpenApi-docs with required body parameter? #53813
  • Remove usage of InterceptorsPreview feature after updating to 8.0 RC2 SDK #50798
  • RequestDelegateGenerator should move to GetInterceptableLocation API #55152
    9.0-preview4
  • Error connecting my client, .NET MAUI project, to my signalr server, ASP .NET project. #54228
  • NavigationManager different behavior on WebAssembly since 8.0.3 #55171

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `5a37b51` to `d83fee1` #55380
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Cache request values when hosting metrics are enabled #55351
    area-hosting, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fix form handling and add NuGet pkg docs #55321
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • UnixCertificateManager: implement IsTrusted. #55335
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Partitioned cookie attribute #55371
    area-networking
  • [H/3] Fix code passed into QuicConnection.CloseAsync and QuicStream.Abort #55282
    area-networking
  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-dump : "Can not load or initialize libmscordaccore.so" #4632
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Supports collecting GCSettingsEvent for gc-collect profile #4615

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] OnSizeAllocated called repeatedly using On<iOS>() .SetUseSafeArea(true); #22090
  • Android Video Capture - MediaPicker.Default.CaptureVideoAsync is saving recorded videos to the Android Gallery #22087
  • Multi-Project App template creates invalid solution when un-checking platforms #22086
    .NET 8 SR5
  • 8.0.21 update breaks android label wrap feature which causes other controls exceeding layout borders #22083
    .NET 8 SR5
  • In iOS, CollectionView row does not shift down if row above it resizes #22082
  • Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22079
    Backlog
  • Error handling is different for compiled bindings #22078
  • [iOS] `FlyoutPage` secondary toolbar items covers `Detail` content on iOS #22077
    Backlog
  • BindableLayout Height loading Time #22076
    Backlog
  • Button rendering overflow issue when padding is set in StackLayout. #22075
    Backlog
  • CollectionView crashes on iOS and MacCatalyst when new items are added and it's in a view which isn't visible #22072
    Backlog
  • VSCode get stuck in Xcode: verifying environment #22071
  • Permissions.CheckStatusAsync<Permissions.Bluetooth> on iOS returns Granted when don't allow is chosen #22070

Closed

  • Applink makes app hang after using back button in Android with MAUI 8 #20267
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid App Fails To Load Certain IFrames #20091
  • Null Pointer Crash in KeyboardAutoScrollManager.AdjustPosition #21160
  • [IOS] KeyboardAutoScrollManager NullReferenceException when focussing Editor/Entry in modal bottom sheet #21726
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Button with image not scaling to HeightRequest on iOS and Android #9734
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Fix Native View Bounding Box are not empty tests for WinUI #9054
    Backlog
  • Preferences crash when debugging in Windows #18385
  • [iOS] Implement PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #19970
    .NET 8 SR5
  • [regression/8.0.3] Android - Cannot create instance of type, no Java peer type found #18819
  • Maui Application not launching #21829
  • ToolTipProperties.Text does not update when used in DataTemplate #21827
  • MAUI CollectionView causes to crash app on both IOS and Android #21855

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in modal pages #22089
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • Bump $(MicrosoftMauiPreviousDotNetReleasedVersion) to 8.0.21 (#22066) #22088
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area/templates 📄, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix screenshot for 18242 for new test behavior #22081
  • Bump $(MicrosoftMauiPreviousDotNetReleasedVersion) to 8.0.21 #22066
  • Fix null reference exception in KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when UIWindow is null #21753
    community ✨, area/keyboard, control-window
  • [iOS] Allow compat iOS buttons to resize image and to respect spacing and padding #21759
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Windows] Reenabled ReturnsNonEmptyNativeBoundingBox tests #20238
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing, testing-reenable
  • [iOS] Implemented PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • Fix main #22065

Updated

  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #21304
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't work with multiple DbContext #33620
  • Syntactic element ` is not correct #33619
  • is it possible to store recursive data types as json column? #33618
    Backlog
  • Achieving database null semantics with string concatenation #33616
  • When to trigger IMaterializationInterceptor if materialization is not from a query? #33614

Closed

  • EntityTypeBuilder.ToFunction vs ModelBuilder.HasDbFunction inconsistencies in inheritance mapping? #33408
  • Generic type converters for property types. #33497
  • Upgrade The Base Package Of Microsoft Like Humanizer To Net8.0 #33498
  • HasDbFunction can't map void type functions (aka procedures) #33583
  • Collection of primitives to JSON column --> Navigation #33585
  • Can I add an arbitrary UPDATE statement within SaveChanges' transaction? #33617
  • DbContext from pool contains many InternalEntityEntry instances after clearing change tracker #33354
  • Influencing column mapping of composite keys in SQL Server #33615

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Deliver first-class Snap installers for .NET #6991

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #19600

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #19571
  • Enable coherency dependency flow on items just added to the SDK #19592

Updated

  • Use asset manifests exclusively to produce/consume previously source built artifacts #19585
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Update .NET 9 p3 to p4 in the table #19587
  • Enable scenario test execution in VMR build #19222
